entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.0°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Cloudy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
